review: john travolta played the role very perfectly, a typical new york kid looking up for his dream. not distracted by hurdles of life, but only thing stands in his way is his ego. interesting story that tells what it takes to be in entertainment industry.
such a frickin great film tony manero comes back to be a broadway dancer but faces problems with life he overcomes them and gives a fantastic performance at the end so good
best movie ever, helped inspire my teenage dreams come true of being a dancer.
love this movie, watched it more times than the guards watch the queen!
